Description: Preparation for the flight into Egypt; the Virgin Mary seated on the ground in profile facing left and holding the Christ Child on her knee, with St Joseph saddling a donkey to left. c.1579-1581 Engraving
Curator's comments: This impression has been cut along the lower edge of the image, removing a margin containing two Italian couplets.
Bibliographic references: Bohlin 1979 / Prints and related drawings by the Carracci family (38.I)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Consul Joseph Smith (His name printed on the mount)
Acquisition notes: With Philipe's blindstamp and initials HS.
